pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Mass Spectrum Missing Peaks Abundance Imputation // Two-Step Lasso (TS-Lasso) and compound minimum methods to recover the abundance of missing peaks in mass spectrum analysis. TS-Lasso is an imputation method that handles various types of missing peaks simultaneously. This package provides the procedure to generate missing peaks (or data) for simulation study, as well as a tool to estimate and visualize the proportion of missing at random.
